column1: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. Opportunities don't happen. You create them. To be the best
column2: you must be able to handle the worst. Success is not in what you have
column3: but who you are. If you can dream it
column4: you can do it. Optimization Great things never come from comfort zones. Monitoring Do what you love and the money will follow. Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom. Parallel Processing Load Testing
